==================

  * Use flow strict mode (i.e. `@flow strict`).

==================

  * Add LICENSE file.

2.2.1 / 2016-03-09
==================

  * Use `NODE_ENV` variable instead of `__DEV__` to cache `process.env.NODE_ENV`.

==================

  * Use `error.name` instead of `Invariant Violation`.
